The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 24 December is 1,874,731 (3,330.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 19 December, there were 188,980 new confirmed cases (335.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 12 December, there were 116,920 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 62% (72,060 extra cases).
